name: get-mesh-children
title: Get MeSH child concepts from MeSH Tree Number
description: Given a MeSH Tree Number, get MeSH child concepts

parameter.name: code
parameter.documentation: MESH Tree Number for parent concept

parameter.name: concept
parameter.documentation: Coding for child concepts. Each concept has an extension for the tree number of that concept. If the parent concept does not have any child, server SHALL return an empty array
